intro: A complete edition of the game with various add-on content and new scenarios.
description:
"NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Awakening," where players can truly experience the Warring States period with officers who make decisions for themselves, now has a complete edition that includes various add-on content that has been released.

The game:
Players are supported by faithful retainers who act on their own judgement. The "Dominion" system will allow players to obtain and grant territory to retainers, so they can divvy up and parcel out the beautifully detailed Warring States Japan as they like, and make it prosper!
The game will also include a large variety of high-quality features befitting of the 40th anniversary of the series, including submission, direct talks, council officials, sieges, castle roles, and province plans, allowing the lords and their retainers to progress as one.
From famous officers to beautiful princesses, over 2,200 officers will be included, the greatest number in the series. Players can now come together with highly individualistic retainers and move history!

The contents:
The complete edition includes the previously released early purchase bonus, pre-order bonus, and "Kou Shibusawa's 40th Anniversary Commemorative Officer Data Set," along with six new scenarios, such as "Birth of Nobunaga."
For more details about the complete edition contents, please see the official site.

Note:
- This content is also included in "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Awakening Complete Edition + Collector's Set." Please be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
- The "Kou Shibusawa Secret Strategy Data & Officers Art Book," "Digital Officer Artbook," "Digital NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION 40th Anniversary Commemorative Book," "Digital Complete Soundtrack," and other limited time add-on content are not included.

- Please be aware that you cannot carry over save data to or from the Nintendo Switch™ version of "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Awakening."
